feecalculator

Class FeeCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • feecalculator.FeeCalculator

  • public class FeeCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    To develop the fee calculator for non-resident MS-ACS graduate students who enroll courses at Northwest Missouri State University. This calculator shall calculate the total amount that students have to pay to the university. This would include the scholarship amounts also.
